page.title: 19Tresco School
page.content: Tresco Primary School serves the two island communities of Tresco and Bryher. Those at present in the school are: Junior Class Infant Class {Alexis Coombe Steven Dan {James Stedeford Grenville Pender {Kit Pender Francesca Taylor {Robert Coombe Claire Christopher {Winona McNicholas Helen Pearce {Rachel Jenkins Katie Dan {Matthew Rose Lydia Birch {Daniel Bennett Neil Jenkins {Greme Haley Class and Headteacher Class-Teacher {Mr.John Kirk Miss Julie Hudson { }The building is over 150 years old and consists of two classrooms, an entrance hall, a small playground, and just outside the School Green to use. A paradise!
